notes.tipOne: Your goal is to interrogate all suspects, determine who is guilty of the crime, and ensure that justice is served. Every conversation can bring you closer to the truth — or push it further away.
notes.tipTwo: Each character has unique personality traits that may either help you during the investigation or stand in your way. Pay close attention to their behavior and exploit their weaknesses.
notes.tipThree: Every character has their own stress system. The higher the stress level, the greater the chance of hearing the truth. Be careful — once stress reaches 100, any further conversation with that character will become impossible.

buff_telltruth.name: Infernal Contract
buff_telltruth.desc: Once per game, can reveal one innocent soul. The price is shared by all.

buff_slowstresschars.name: Warm Hearth
buff_slowstresschars.desc: Other characters gain stress more slowly.

buff_storydetails.name: Keen Eye
buff_storydetails.desc: Knows more details about the story.

nerf_harmlessspeech.name: Vow of Mercy
nerf_harmlessspeech.desc: Will not say anything that could hurt someone.

nerf_stresschars.name: Corrupting Presence
nerf_stresschars.desc: Other characters start with higher stress.

nerf_simplelanguage.name: Primitive Speech
nerf_simplelanguage.desc: Does not understand more complex words.

nerf_stresslies.name: False Comfort
nerf_stresslies.desc: The higher the stress, the more often they lie.

nerf_corruptedchat.name: System Instability
nerf_corruptedchat.desc: The higher the stress, the more corrupted the conversation becomes.

special_bravevoice.name: Whisper of the Brave
special_bravevoice.desc: Speaks with the voice of the bravest person; if they are the bravest, they tell the truth. Stress increases twice as fast while active.

special_truthliecycle.name: Jester's Rhythm
special_truthliecycle.desc: Alternates between telling the truth and lying.

special_borrowedtrait.name: Borrowed Persona
special_borrowedtrait.desc: At the start of the game, randomly copies traits from another character.

ch1.title: Poet
ch1.behaviour: Speaks metaphorically, uses poetic comparisons, rhymes, and riddles.

ch2.title: Angel
ch2.behaviour: Speaks gently, with empathy and calm.

ch3.title: Zombie
ch3.behaviour: Speaks briefly, monotonously, and without emotion; seems indifferent.

ch6.title: Caveman
ch6.behaviour: Speaks simply and bluntly, avoids embellishments.

ch8.title: Knight
ch8.behaviour: Speaks with honor, in a formal and archaic style.

ch9.title: Narcissist
ch9.behaviour: Speaks with exaggerated self-confidence, convinced of their own perfection.

ch10.title: Ghost
ch10.behaviour: Speaks quietly, timidly, often repeats others' words.

ch11.title: Santa Claus
ch11.behaviour: Speaks in a cheerful, warm tone.

ch14.title: Priest
ch14.behaviour: Speaks in a restrained, moralizing tone.

ch16.title: Actor
ch16.behaviour: Speaks theatrically, exaggerates emotions, changes tone dramatically.

ch17.title: Chef
ch17.behaviour: Speaks passionately about food, uses culinary metaphors and comparisons.

ch18.title: Pirate
ch18.behaviour: Speaks loudly, slurs words, uses pirate slang and inappropriate humor.

ch19.title: Scientist
ch19.behaviour: Speaks precisely, analytically, and uses scientific terminology.

ch20.title: Vampire
ch20.behaviour: Speaks elegantly, slowly, and with predatory calm.
